00002 
00003 // \author Will Scott
00004 #include "dcsl_miabot_high_level_math.h"
00005 #include <math.h>
00006 
00016 void miabot_follower_control(double* way, double* pos, int numRobots)
00017 {
00018         way[0] = pos[0];
00019         way[1] = pos[1];
00020         way[2] = pos[2];
00021         
00022 
00023         if (numRobots > 1)
00024         {
00025                 double min_dist = 0.2; // radius of target within which to stop
00026                 double dist, phi, this_x, this_y, prev_x, prev_y;
00027                 for (int i = 1; i < numRobots; i++)
00028                 {
00029                         // set waypoint along the vector from bot i to bot i-1,
00030                         // at distance min_dist from bot i-1 (so they don't collide)
00031                         this_x = pos[3*i + 0];
00032                         this_y = pos[3*i + 1];
00033                         //this_theta = pos[3*i + 2];
00034                         prev_x = pos[3*(i-1) + 0];
00035                         prev_y = pos[3*(i-1) + 1];
00036                         //prev_theta = pos[3*(i-1) + 2];
00037                         
00038                         // calculate distance from and angle towards prev bot
00039                         dist = sqrt(pow(this_x-prev_x,2) + pow(this_y-prev_y,2));
00040                         phi = atan2(prev_y - this_y, prev_x - this_x);
00041 
00042                         if (dist < min_dist)
00043                         {
00044                                 // just stay where it is if it's already close,
00045                                 // and turn towards prev bot
00046                                 way[3*i + 0] = this_x;
00047                                 way[3*i + 1] = this_y;
00048                                 way[3*i + 2] = phi;
00049                         }
00050                         else
00051                         {
00052                                 // move closer
00053                                 way[3*i + 0] = this_x + cos(phi)*(dist - min_dist);
00054                                 way[3*i + 1] = this_y + sin(phi)*(dist - min_dist);
00055                                 way[3*i + 2] = phi;                             
00056                         }
00057 
00058                 }
00059         }
00060 }
